salaryExpectations: LKR 140,000 (Associate PM) to LKR 800,000+ (Senior Program Manager) per month.
futureOutlook: As the IT industry in Sri Lanka grows, so does the need for skilled managers who can deliver complex projects on time and within budget. Project managers with professional certifications like PMP and a strong understanding of Agile practices are in constant demand. It's a key leadership role in any tech company.
